website_summaries.verdict: A generously sized ironing board with an iron rest and sturdy, adjustable legs.
pros: A workhorse for the laundry room
cons: It's pricey and also on the heavy side

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Brabantia Ironing Board
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this ironing board. After my last wonderful ironing board (not a Brabantia) was assassinated by my cats I was insistent on getting a high quality replacement that would withstand the demands of a rogue woman who actually irons her clothes as well as irons her quilting projects. This was very expensive for my budget so it does not stand opened and accessible to cat attacks now. The wide platform at the end easily holds my iron, spray starch and water spray bottle as well as being a convenient hanger-hold for the waiting garments. I know this isn't the board for everybody but if you are a serious quilter/sewist/ironed-clothing-wearer you should really consider the Brabantia ironing board.
customer_reviews.author: Geminidream

customer_reviews.title: Buyer be ware: defective product, no customer service
customer_reviews.text: The steam iron holder failed when I set a screaming hot iron on the platform. The welds holding the platform completely broke, and the hot iron crashed to the floor. I have tried to reach out to the manufacturer and they have no useable contact route. No phone number. The only way their website allows for customer contact is through and email form THAT HAS A DEAD LINK. Brabantia, please reach out to me. Failure of such an expensive board should not happen with less then 15 uses. I can not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Saimaa

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this after finally retiring a 30 year old ironing board. Do not overpay for this ironing board! It is too large for my basic needs (mostly bedding and table linens- at most 2-3x/month. Also, it arrived stained despite being wrapped in cellophane. I’m keeping it because it would be too annoying to return due to its size (and I already recycled the shipping box) but don’t waste your money on this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Legs came off the track after only 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: After only 2 months the legs started coming off the track and after the 3rd time it happened I gave up. This board was too expensive to have an issue like this after only 2 months. Wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: E. Alfano

customer_reviews.title: Unbalanced legs
customer_reviews.text: I'm guessing that one of the leg is too short. Only three legs are holding up the board with the fourth one just hovering half an inch off the ground. Had to add padding to the shorter leg to stop it from wobbling. Expected better quality from a $100+ ironing board.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Very well-made!
customer_reviews.text: This is a high-quality, solid ironing table. It's very sturdy, and the padding is quite adequate. I'm not crazy about the cover's design, but that's a personal choice. It's too bad you can't select from a few designs. The only thing I would point out is that it really is quite wide. If you have smaller-sized shirts that don't have buttons (i.e., t-shirts), you won't be able to put them over the ironing board, but will instead need to iron them by lying them flat across the board (so ironing front and back at the same time--not ideal for a wrinkle-free look).
customer_reviews.author: SwissMiss

customer_reviews.title: No child safety lock.
customer_reviews.text: This ironing board is sturdy and well made. The problem with it is there is no child safety lock. When you pick up and move the board, the height changes then collapses. We thought it was missing a piece or we were not operating it properly, but we found one locally and it operated the same way. Called their customer service number twice, was put on hold then disconnected. They are located in Belgium 6 hours ahead of us. THANK YOU Amazon for allowing us to return the item.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Best ironing board
customer_reviews.text: Ordinarily I purchase an inexpensive yet practical ironing board. Recently I decided to look into better quality boards. After reading reviews by people who sew a lot I settled on this board. It is significantly heavier than any board I have previously owned. But when I unwrapped the board and lifted it into position I was pleased by the quality, sturdiness and stability of the product. The cover, padding, height adjustment mechanism and iron rest are well designed. I was worried about the design of the legs, concerned that they would make the board unstable. I couldn't have been more wrong. When I started ironing I wished I had this board decades ago. No regrets. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: prickly pear az

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, attractive and handy
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite ironing board - but there is one issue. I love the tray on the back for spray starch or sizing or a glass of tea while you're ironing! It is easy to pull up and set in place and it is stable during ironing - but when you need to collapse the board the closure trigger is TOO fast. When you combine the quick collapse with the weight of the ironing board, I have been hit or pinched every time I have tried to close it.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice build quality but variable quality control.
customer_reviews.text: The first ironing board arrived with extremely uneven legs, such that only three feet touch the floor on a perfectly level surface, and the entire board rocks back and fourth with a sway of several inches making it largely unusable (and unsafe if a hot iron were to topple off due to the instability). The build quality seems decent apart from the leg inconsistency, which gives the impression that the design is solid but quality control is non-existent at the factory. Edit: The replacement board Amazon sent is fine, and the defective board has been shipped back.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: The cover is not what I expected.  It frayed after one month of using.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Brabantia because it looked the most elegant and sturdy. It had a neutral pad and cover which also appealed to me. I registered the product on their site. And when I returned to see if I could exchange my beat and defective cover - i t might require a complete return rather than a replacement of the cover and that's it. So we will see. I am noting that there are otherpeople in the que here commenting on the cover issues. So I am not the first one. And I really don't want to return the whole thing but I will if it's impossible for the company to right this 20 buck issue.
customer_reviews.author: Haynes Abney RajBhandary

customer_reviews.title: The Ironing board works a little better than the one I got from Target
customer_reviews.text: The Ironing board works a little better than the one I got from Target. The main difference is that the Brabantia has a slightly thinker pad and you don't get the mesh embossed on the clothes when ironing. It said that the board is "Super Stable". I consider that false advertisement. The board has a very traditional construction and is no better in stability than my $20 Target one. I can't justify the high price and wish I had seen the product before purchasing it. Buy something that it is cheaper. There is no way it won't perform as well as the Brabantia board.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item of MUCH cheaper quality sent
customer_reviews.text: Was VERY disappointed I ordered the Brabantia and got a cheap knock off. I hope to understand how this happened and how I can get the one I ordered?!?! There's no option in returns that says, "Return WRONG item and resend correct order".
customer_reviews.author: kate quinn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sewing and quilting
customer_reviews.text: I bought this board for pressing sewing and quilting projects and love it so much! I'm 5'11" so many ironing boards feel on the low side for me but this one is perfect and really tall, with a huge amount is space for working. The only downside is that it's a bit too large on the end for ironing clothes to wear, but I make it work. This was exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Monkeysee

customer_reviews.title: My Forever-Ironing Board
customer_reviews.text: This iron board is fantastic. I now LOVE to iron. It's big, broad, soft, stable and extremely well made. I'm excited in the knowledge that I now own my forever-ironing board. I know for sure that I will never have to buy another ironing board again. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: C.S.

customer_reviews.title: ouch
customer_reviews.text: using the steam function on my Shark iron, the steam penetrates the layers of the ironing board covering and the steam will drip through the grates of the board. My older board was 25 years old and had a solid surface, never had any problem with water dripping. unfortuantely, i used an easy press device and pressed to hard and broke the leg. they don't make things like they use to. Spent alot for this and expected better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lucille

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This a great ironing board. It is not light weight but that is okay because the weight is one of the things that makes it so sturdy not to mention how it is made. It does not wobble at all when ironing. Love the width when ironing large things and I also love the iron stand it has. It even has a little shelf under the board and I have actually used it. A little pricey but definitely good quality. You know the saying you get what you pay for, well it was well worth it. No regrets with this purchase. I see this ironing board lasting me a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Barrilleaux

customer_reviews.title: For this price Product quality is too poor
customer_reviews.text: For this price Product quality is too poor and I did replaced once because of the rod bents and the second one came same. I hope I will check in Walmart if I can better quality then this for this price. I hope manufactur will do better quality product or at least for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dileep Tikkisetty

customer_reviews.title: good quality ironing board, well made
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty, good quality ironing board. I hate ironing, and while this board does not make me love it, it does make it less painful because the wide parts of the board make it easy to do the backs of my shirts at one go. The little hanging area, and space for folded clothes are also helpful.
customer_reviews.author: AB123

customer_reviews.title: Good Ironing Board but very wide
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful ironing board--sturdy, good solid cover, nice features like an resting spot for the iron and another for un-ironed clothing. I used my last ironing board for almost 40 years until it rusted through. I waited so long to buy a new one because I hate that the newer versions are smaller, meaning it takes me longer to iron, especially XL men's shirts. So, this Brabantia seemed perfect being having extra wide dimensions. I wanted to love it and do prefer it over the smaller ones; but it is almost too wide. It works great on XL men's shirts, but my women's small shirts get stretched out. It is however terrific for ironing curtains, or bed spreads.
customer_reviews.author: Weanling

customer_reviews.title: Should have purchased bigger board sooner
customer_reviews.text: I quilt and was tired of struggling with fitting everything on my standard size board. I thought this was a splurge, but an extremely happy I finally bought a bigger board!!! There is just enough more room that you appreciate it when ironing bigger items. Highly recommend this board. Very sturdy and folds and unfolds easily. Multiple height adjustments to fit anyone standing or sitting. Love this board!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wizard50

customer_reviews.title: Good ironing board. Bad packaging = damaged cover (rip)
customer_reviews.text: My ironing board arrived quickly and functions as advertised - well. The cover, on the other hand, arrived with a large rip in the fabric on the side. This appears a packaging related damage. We will see on how replacement of torn cover is handled before a final review is offered. At this point, bad buy.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Brown

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: It came completely pushed in on one whole side of the ironing board, and it is METAL, this is something that should have never happened, especially not for how expensive it is. The legs were not even attached. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Kleinmann

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Can one be in love with an ironing board?
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I can’t believe I have been using my crappy ironing board for so long before deciding it is time to boy this. Actually, before getting this board, I ordered another board on Amazon based on cool looks, but it was a piece of junk. This board looks simple and smart, and is so well built! I added a silver cover, which resulted in a handsome board that I hope will serve me for the rest of my life. I mean, I really hope someone else could iron my clothes for me, but in the meantime, I will enjoy doing that myself with the help of this sturdy thing!
customer_reviews.author: Monni

customer_reviews.title: Best ironing board I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this ironing board for it's longer ironing surface length and it's extra width. I also wanted the iron rest that could be used from either side of the board. This ironing board is very sturdy, the cover is tight and a good quality fabric. The silicon covered rest on the iron stand helps keep the iron from shifting if I accidentally bump into the board. The height level is easy to adjust with a lever just under the edge of the board. The board it easy to fold up when I want to put it away, though since I have a sewing room/office I tend to leave it up a lot of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Davis Senior

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Ironing Experience
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this board is heavy. Yes, this board is bulky. Yes, this board is pricey. But.... It is really a very nice, sturdy, almost-professional ironing board. The cover is very well padded and allow steam pass-through quite nicely. The iron holder is very solid - no wiggle or worry there about your iron dropping. The wider surface saves me about 20% less ironing time as I can iron half of the front or back of dress shirts without having to turn in between. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Yo' Vinny

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and executed - great for projects.
customer_reviews.text: This board replaces a much smaller ancient worn out regular board. This is about 50% broader than a regular board and provides an excellent surface for steam ironing. We use it with a cordless iron, so the generous end table holds the base station with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Maeder

customer_reviews.title: Large, solid and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The board is really big. Good for ironing large flats. But the narrow end is so wide you can't put pants, or small items over the edge to press. I wish the iron holder could be removed. It's in the way and the iron cord gets caught in the cracks. But it is very solid and well made ironing board. Just read the specs before you buy it. If you use heavy pressure when you iron and other ironing boards collapse, this is a great option. I'm a crafter and ended up happy with this big one plus a cheapie regular size for smaller work
customer_reviews.author: JACQUELINE STACK

customer_reviews.title: Quality problem twice
customer_reviews.text: First I received had one leg damaged. So it was 1” shorter and wouldn’t stay up on four legs. I returned for replacement. Replacement board has problem in top metal mesh. Mesh does not sit properly on supports and keep making bubbles with spring action and noisy. I will have return this as well
customer_reviews.author: A Patel

customer_reviews.title: WOW!  GREAT QUALITY!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This really nice ironing board is made of high quality materials and is well constructed. It has easy, smooth action when opening and closing. Very sturdy when set-up. No slipping, wobbling, or tipping. Nice wide surface with great quality padding. This is the best ironing board I've ever owned. Well worth the price. I would buy this again. A+ and 5 stars. Highly recommend. :) jlp
customer_reviews.author: :) jlp

customer_reviews.title: Big, sturdy ironing boards
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace my old, standard ironing board that was not closing anymore. This opens smoothly, has a nice wide surface area, a stable place to rest your iron, and it raises up to counter height (wasn’t expecting that) which is perfect for when ironing standing up. I wish they made a longer version because I do a lot of sewing and a slightly longer ironing board sourness ideal, but this is the beast I could find.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Six

customer_reviews.title: Wanna Iron?
customer_reviews.text: Who really wants to iron? No one. However this ironing board with or with the additional purchase of a "new" cover is excellent. Because of the size and sturdiness you can finish tasks quickly. It does make a difference. I use a Rowenta Iron and zip through all that I want ironed. Like the Princess and the Pea I need ironed sheets...no cure except this ironing board with the proper width make ironing an ease.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the risk!
customer_reviews.text: Saw so many bad reviews, I feel compelled to write a good one - this thing is awesome - it’s made in Latvia, so it’s almost expected that there might be some issues with the packaging etc (what most of the complaints were about) but with the exception of one end of the cardboard box having burst the tape, mine got to me in perfect shape. So I’d have to say it’s worth the gamble, to get what is probably the nicest one out there. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Bigsurpete

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: The features we like about this board are its stability and adequate padding. No more waffle marks on our clothes! The rack below is a nice feature, I guess, but we haven't used it yet. The iron cradle is nice because it is adjustable. The extra width is nice for being able to iron my husband's shirts. The only thing that could be better for us is to have a longer and narrower nose on the board. We can't get my pants over the nose because it is too wide. I wear an average-sized pant. We have only had it for a couple of months, so I cannot report on its durability.
customer_reviews.author: Yogini Mama

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction but heavy.
customer_reviews.text: Strong and stable, but heavy. The shelf below is easy to remove. The iron holder is welded to the frame. I cut through the weld with a dremel tool and discarded it to have unobstructed use of the square end. I wanted the stability of four legs with a wide ironing surface. This board is now perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent enough ironing board but not much better than less expensive models
customer_reviews.text: I really like the wide iron rest but the metal frame of the ironing board itself is surprisingly flimsy. It wobbles, not from the feet but the underside of the board where the top frame meets the legs. There's no way to adjust anything, it's just the way the thing is made with overly roomy gaps between moving parts. Not worth returning but it's really annoying for what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Audubon

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy with this ironing board
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this ironing board. The size is fantastic and you can use it for folding. The ability to make it a little higher than your average ironing board is a big plus. It's extremely comfortable to use because of the height adjustments. Very sturdy and I can already tell it's going to be the last board I buy. The quality is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Kimble

customer_reviews.title: Ferrari of Ironing Boards
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic ironing board...a bit pricey, but worth it - especially if you do lots of ironing. Plus: - Quality manufacturing and attention to details - Extra large ironing surface - Premium ironing board cover; light years better than the cheapo silver ones you get with a board from Walmart - Sturdy and substantial feeling; very, very little shaking/movement compared with a typical two-leg ironing board - Great packaging; heavier box and heavy gauge shrink wrap Minus: - Circles pattern on cover; with thin white shirts, the dark circles "bleed" through the shirt and can fake you into believing they are wrinkles; not a big deal for most things I iron, but worth mentioning
customer_reviews.author: NOVA Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but too big for some clothes.
customer_reviews.text: Great product quality But it is too large for ordinary ironing of polo shirts, t shirts etc. it is sooooooo wide, that I found I was having to stretch the delicate garments too much in order to fit them around the end of the board. The point is also too fat to easily fit the seats of pants etc. This would be a perfect board for sheets or pants. But for closed garments that have to be threaded onto the tip of the board, go for the smaller option. I returned this and got the narrower version. Perfectly happy.
customer_reviews.author: Maximus

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: I sew for a living. This is more than just an ironing board it is an essential tool. Amazing height variation, love the iron stand, quick delivery and am extremely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine L. Maulucci

customer_reviews.title: A great ironing board
customer_reviews.text: An amazing ironing table. The extra width makes a huge difference in ironing especially long and wide pieces. I wear hijab, so this has cut down my ironing time and effort tremendously. Quality is amazing and great. One thing, I would recommend buying the extra reflective ironing cover to add to the original cover. Works better.
customer_reviews.author: Ghadeer Kunna

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't sure I would like the wider width
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure I would like the wider width, especially since I have limited space in my sewing area, but this is awesome. It is sturdy and I really like the extension table for the iron. I use a gravity fed iron so it sits on a silicone tray rather than on it's heal The extension table is perfect for this.n I do
customer_reviews.author: Ruth A Kirchner

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the extra width!
customer_reviews.text: If you ever iron sheets, you've probably wished for a wider ironing board. This is it! Excellent quality; folds up easily and is easy to carry and to adjust the height. Very glad I bought it, and I'd highly recommend. The only flaw is that the metal tray attached at the end doesn't fold down and isn't removable, but I can live with that.
customer_reviews.author: J. MACDONALD

customer_reviews.title: Nice Table
customer_reviews.text: This ironing board makes a nice ironing table for those of us that like to quilt. It helps to distribute the width of the square we are ironing. It would make a great addition to someone that likes to iron larger clothes, or would fit a whole outfit for a smaller person.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well-made and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Loved the additional surface created by the 18" width and iron rest for pressing quilt pieces. Ordered the Ecru cover which can be washed and reused, as I also use finishing spray on fabrics. Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Gail HI

customer_reviews.title: BIGGER IS BETTER!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is HUGE and AWESOME! (I am 5'7" so you can see how big it is next to me!) I have a huge collection of vintage tablecloths, and the extra wide ironing area makes it SO much easier to work with them! Having a hot iron stand is great, too.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Blennerhassit

customer_reviews.title: Adjustment Mechanism Needs Work, Good Ironing Surface!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very heavy ironing board and I hate the way it latches or doesn't latch to raise and lower the ironing. Since it is a very heavy board by the time you flip it over to use it the adjustments have slipped out of the notches and it's way too tall or doesn't catch. They need to work on the adjusting mechanism. Other than that the ironing service is good and I like a place to put the iron while I am ironing wide items like tablecloths and such.
customer_reviews.author: Craftylady

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this ironing board for almost three months now and it has been a dream. Large enough board space for any type of clothing, sturdy craftsmanship, perfect side attachment for you to rest your iron on either upright or flat, and even an attached rack for you to store your clothing or ironing essentials on. Overall, not only is this ironing board beautiful and exquisite quality, but convenient and practical. A mother/wife’s dream :)
customer_reviews.author: Thee

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: Always buy these ironing boards for their quality and good size providing a large ironing surface. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mal Stott

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy stable ironing board.
customer_reviews.text: Love that this clicks when folded so it doesn’t just open yet it opens easily. It is wide for my quilting projects. Only con is that it can be difficult ironing sorts or smaller items. It is sturdy and stable which I love. I also like the metal tray on the side for the iron
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best home ironing board I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is the best home ironing board I've ever used. It is the most stable, and the width feels just right. The metal iron rest is perfect for my Oliso smart iron, and when my iron is not sitting on it, I can place other things like my coffee on it! The board is not light, so I keep it up in my sewing room, and it doubles as a designing surface for fabric. Wish I'd bought it years ago!
customer_reviews.author: DEE GF

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT! Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: After decades of ironing with "just-OK" boards, I finally spent the money to get a decent ironing board - and this one is STELLAR! It's so sturdy and secure, even when ironing fast or with large items. It holds the iron very well in the holder. It's no big deal to learn where the release lever is to collapse it and it stores well standing folded on its "back" legs. The large surface is great and I've had no problems with fitting sleeves, etc over the narrow end. I'm so pleased with this ironing board!
customer_reviews.author: yoda

customer_reviews.title: hate them. Thank goodness I found this board
customer_reviews.text: I looked and looked for a real ironing board. I'm from the era of the wooden ironing board. It seems modern board rock to and fro with a light breeze. Cheap...hate them. Thank goodness I found this board. Worth every penny ! Nice and wide and a little shorter than the standard cheap variety. Perfect ! And it will adjust EASILY. It even goes up tall enough that this 6 foot woman doesn't have to stoop to sew. It's heavy duty ! Easy to fold up. I got an over the door hanger on amazon that holds the iron also .....excellent with this board
customer_reviews.author: Chyrl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Great board! I was suffering to choose it... doubting and debating with myself if it will be good for my needs.. But it is!!! It's wide, it's having a mesh bottom that let's you to use a steam station, the legs are stable.. Just perfect for my tailoring ! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Well-Built, Superior Ironing Board
customer_reviews.text: This is the rolls royce of ironing boards - very sturdy, well-built and easy to use. This heavy board stays put and does not wobble making for easy ironing. I could not be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great ironing boarding
customer_reviews.text: I love the multi levels of the board. It is very sturdy. I love the width of the board as imquilt and it is easier with my new board. The iron rack is very useful for opening the entire board up to presson
customer_reviews.author: KMiller

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but quality!
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but this ironing board is a top! My mom always had a cheap crappy iron and ironing board when I was growing up. So I bought this one because I was fed-up with having the same. No regrets! It works amazing! Great pad. Gender neutral color pattern. Iron holder is convenient. Up and down is a breeze. Extremely sturdy and allows me to get me clothes done faster with the wider board. It's a bit pricey but it is definitely quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Finally an iron board that's big enough to iron more that socks lol. No seriously I love the width. I have plenty of room to iron long dresses, large shirts and pants. The iron holder at the end is nice but sometimes I feel like it will get too hot and start a fire. Something I'll have to get used to, I don't leave irons alone anyway. Currently I'm trying to find a hanger for the board. Most are the normal size.
customer_reviews.author: Katniss

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made. Extremely durable and sturdy. Not your typical ironing board. Board is substantial does not flex while ironing. Feels strong and tough. Well worth the money. Be aware for the size C-wide the narrow end is too wide to put through the sleeves of long sleeve shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Caligirl

customer_reviews.title: Love this wide board
customer_reviews.text: I'm a man of 66 years of age. No, I don't iron every day, but when I do, I want a quality finished look to whatever it is that I'm ironing. Love this wide board, and no more bending over, which is really nice. I'm 5'11" tall, not a real tall man no, but not short either, and as I say, this is really nice, and easy to work with. Was worth the price after only one use: that's how much I like it. AWESOME board, and I think the padding is quite nice as well, thick and soft, yet firm which you need. Great product ! ! !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally - the ironing board of my dreams!
customer_reviews.text: OMG - after all my life using a lousy, cheap ironing board that wobbled like crazy I feel like I am using the cadillac of ironing boards finally. Ladies (and Gentlemen...!) - don't wait another minute using a sub par ironing board. I wish I had bought this years ago - fabulous. The iron holder on the end is solid as a rock, the board stays put, and the padding is perfect - not too much, not too little. Folds up like a charm - I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Griz

customer_reviews.title: My first Brabantia was bought 50 years ago (! ...
customer_reviews.text: My first Brabantia was bought 50 years ago (!) and I still use it. I needed a new board for our vacation home on St. Simons Island, so I ordered a new one. A few improvements have been made (iron cradle for one), but, in the end, it is a very substantial, well-built device. The manufacturer is also very environmentally conscious--an aspect I appreciate. If you buy quality, this is one to choose.
customer_reviews.author: ergo

customer_reviews.title: Solid workhorse!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy. This iron board is enormous and sturdy. Very stable. Nice padding and cover fabric. The surface is so large that the job is done much faster because you don't have to readjust your clothing or bedding so often while ironing. It is a heavy board but I do not mind that. The only thing I do not like is that the cord of my iron gets caught at the metal part where you set your hot iron while working. I guess I should get a wireless iron!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Van Straten

customer_reviews.title: Not good if you are short.
customer_reviews.text: It will last along time and love the wide width. But I am short and not able to adjust to a comfortable height. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: christine clark

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly and annoying
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this ironing board is wobbly and annoying! I do like the height and it does feel sturdy but the wobbling makes me wish I’d kept my old ironing board. I have no idea how to stabilize this thing. So annoying. Don’t buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Tammi

customer_reviews.title: Nice large ironing surface.
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of this ironing board. Very sturdy unlike most ironing boards. And a nice wide surface makes ironing go a lot faster. Just a bit on the heavy side...
customer_reviews.author: Chris K

customer_reviews.title: Solid product, but way too heavy
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent, well-built board with extra wide space for ironing sheets, etc. However, it is very, very heavy and I can't take it out and set it up myself. Wish I had returned it earlier.
customer_reviews.author: June N.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great wide ironing board that doesn’t wiggle or wobble at all. Expensive but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: MommaD

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing Ironing board
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing Ironing board! I iron my sheets and sew and find this board superior to anything I have owned or seen. The packaging left much to be desired and the cover arrive with rips. Thankfully the issue was resolved and I did not to have to spend time and energy returning it! This company makes a great produce and when my friends see it they tell me they will be ordering one too! I look forward to share this special ironing board with the local quilting group.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Best ironing board EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I paired this with my new Rowenta steam iron and I feel like I work at the cleaners now! I love the wide jars and the iron holder on the end. It’s nice to not knock my iron off my smaller board. Solid and wide... you won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Garansuay

customer_reviews.title: Best Ironing Board Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I've had many ironing boards in my life and this is the best one I've ever used. It is substantial and doesn't feel like it will turn over like those flimsy boards. It has an organizing stand that comes in handy. Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it is a yes!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! 🤩 at first I was looking for the Costco’s iron board, but when I couldn't find it, took a risk with this one, based on Amazon reviews! It was totally worth it!👌🏼 You can adjust the height, it is very stable, easy to store and is wide enough! Now, I think I like it better than the Costco’s! Totally recommendable! Leave you a Tip: I bought an extra cover from the same brand and put it on top of the one that board’s came with, it makes it extra padding!
customer_reviews.author: Kpuga

customer_reviews.title: Best ever ironing board
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I sew (clothing, curtains, pillow, etc.) a lot and the key to great sewing is great ironing. The board is A) tall enough that I don't have to bend my 6' frame when ironing, B) much broader than others, meaning I can iron more material with less manipulating and C) solidly built. The iron rest and under board storage and nice, too.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret C. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Not up to standard
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product, but it's hard to move and not easy to open and close. Won't return it but wished for a better ironing board.
customer_reviews.author: Always220

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Ironing Board!
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted a wide ironing board for years & finally decided to replace a 35 year old rickety board. This new one is very stable, adjustable in height to a nice tall level if you wish, and the width is wonderful! I am very happy with it! The only reason I did not give this board five stars is that the iron cord gets caught between the ironing board and the attached iron rest regularly. I may have to add another electrical outlet in my sewing room so that the iron cord comes from slightly behind me rather than from the end of the board where the current outlet is located.
customer_reviews.author: MMC

customer_reviews.title: Better than most I've seen, but...
customer_reviews.text: Compared to my old ironing board, this one is a big improvement. But for the price, I expected it to be even better than it is. I like the extra width, the cover/pad quality, and the base for the iron. What I'm disappointed with is the stability. While much better than my cheap, old board, it still wobbles. It's also a little awkward to handle in comparison, partly due to its size and the fact the release mechanism is on the opposite side of which I'm accustomed. I'd probably return it except I really don't want to go to any more trouble, and I doubt I'll find one I like better.
customer_reviews.author: me1975

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I gave a 4 star on maneuverability because the board is quite heavy. It does slide open to a standing position and close smoothly and easily.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Moore

customer_reviews.title: Good for tall people
customer_reviews.text: This ironing board is very sturdy. I really like the plastic catch for the legs so that when you have closed the legs they do not accidentally fall open if you trigger the adjustment handle when you are carrying it. My husband, who is tall, likes that it can be adjusted to a higher height (39 inches). The cover is sufficiently padded. I ordered the wider version because I thought it would be better for ironing things like table clothes, which it is. However, I struggle sometimes with fitting my shirts around it. So consider what you iron the most before deciding on a width. If it is mostly clothes, I would go with the standard width.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn M Arbabi

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and smooth board for all our ironing needs
customer_reviews.text: Although this ironing board was expensive it's seems to be sturdy and will hopefully provide us with many years of use. We have it for a few months now and are pleased with its performance.
customer_reviews.author: Rochel G

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.text: It's a little heavy, but nothing that would keep you from moving it around. Nice and wide. Can get lots of stuff on the board to Iron.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Obviously made by people who take pride in their work!
customer_reviews.text: From the shrink wrap protective shipping covering to the VERY stable height adjustment, this product is a work of art. Each weld and connection is secure and crafted from substantial materials. I had to wait a while for delivery, but it was worth it. My last ironing board collapsed while I was ironing. Thankfully I had a good reflexive grip on the iron. This one has notched height adjustment options for security. I expect to use this ironing board for a long time. It might even be worthy of mentioning in my will!
customer_reviews.author: The Nana

customer_reviews.title: No wobbles!
customer_reviews.text: The generous size and minimal wobbling make this perfect for ironing pieces of fabric the size of a room! Oh, it's good for smaller things, too. I like the iron holder idea (never thought I'd like that), though I do wish the iron holder could hold the appliance upright, since my iron has auto-shut off if it sits at an angle for more than 45 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: gtownrunner

customer_reviews.title: How can a person love an ironing board
customer_reviews.text: How can a person love an ironing board..... but I do! It is very sturdy without being too heavy. I haven't owned a full size ironing board in so long, because I couldn't find a good replacement when I gave my last one away several years ago when I moved. This ironing board is perfect and I am sure I will NEVER want to replace it!! It was worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: SherryBerry

customer_reviews.title: well made heavy duty - really wide
customer_reviews.text: I thought the 15" would be too narrow so got this one but it is so wide I can't put it inside a shirt to iron. I got it for ironing fabric for sewing so the width should be perfect for that...but if you are looking to do your basic ironing probably best to get the regular width.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza E Fox

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well-made dream!
customer_reviews.text: This ironing board does not disappoint!! I was so sick of using cheap ironing boards you can buy at any superstore that fall apart in months with regular use. The Brabantia is constructed of sturdy materials, does not sway or rock while using and has adjustable heights. It’s a little heavy, but I’ll trade that for good, sturdy construction. Fantastic board, I’ve recommended it to my entire family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line. Euro design and build quality ...
customer_reviews.text: Top of the line. Euro design and build quality. Wife freaked out over price initially .... but quality costs and she LOVES it.
customer_reviews.author: HighValueWarrior

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy, well made ironing board.
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow, this is the best ironing board ever! It’s super wide and super sturdy. There’s no wiggle at all. I love the iron rest, although the rubber parts make me a little nervous.
customer_reviews.author: Merritt R. Cason

customer_reviews.title: Big beautiful junk
customer_reviews.text: Big beautiful junk. 1st order damaged, replacement also damaged. Straight in the dumpster. Waste of time
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product the extra large width works great for my needs as a quilter
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: I wanted a thick foam padding like my mom had which kept the metal underneath from ...
customer_reviews.text: I searched local stores for an new ironing board and all of the ones I encountered had thin batting as the padding. I wanted a thick foam padding like my mom had which kept the metal underneath from showing. THIS ironing board is awesome! I bought the C size and it is perfect for my sewing, ironing uniforms, and slides nicely under the bed. Great product and you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ceeh

customer_reviews.title: So Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I bought 2 for work. So nice. Heavy duty. Well made. Easy up and down. A+A+A+A+A+
customer_reviews.author: MJMB

customer_reviews.title: Torn Cover discovered upon opening package
customer_reviews.text: Received ironing board today. Anxious to use! Cover is torn, hoping manufacturer will send new undamaged cover???
customer_reviews.author: Janice Richardson

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure you can find a better ironing board. It has a very large surface and is very cushy, great for ironing. Highly doubt you would ever need to buy another ironing board after this one. Seems to be better made than some cars.
customer_reviews.author: Nurture Learners and Able Observers

customer_reviews.title: Big and wide board to help you iron faster
customer_reviews.text: Very spacious. If you iron frequently, buy a board that is big and sturdy so you can iron quicker and more efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Siris

customer_reviews.title: Best ironing board
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this ironing board. Solid not flimsy, can raise it very high if you desire so no leaning down, iron sits firmly on tray.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: While this board is extremely sturdy, it is very heavy and a problem to move often. When using the steam setting on my iron, water eventually drips onto the floor beneath this board.
customer_reviews.author: P.A.

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase for me!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS! If you iron often you need to buy this. I love how tall it gets. I am 5'9" and those standard cheap ones are not tall enough. The cushion cover is thick and I never see or feel the metal table through my projects.
customer_reviews.author: Carena

customer_reviews.title: Happy I purchased this board
customer_reviews.text: I enjoying ironing, so this board was perfect for me. It was wide enough for different items, sturdy, adjustable height, very nice cover and not so heavy that I could handle moving it.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: extremely sturdy
customer_reviews.text: wife loves it, except for weight - very sturdy and broad for sewing , may be too big for light laundry ironing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Lynnelle Hite

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Ironing Board
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ironing board. It's big, so measure where you are going to store it to make sure it fits. Very sturdy, doesn't wobble!! I love the height adjustment, my old one didn't have that feature, I'm 5'1", so being able to iron a little lower is a treat! I like the steam function on my iron, and so far this ironing board has not shown any signs of rust. My mom recommended it as she has used one for a few years and is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: MommyKaz

product_meta.title: Brabantia Steam Rest Ironing Board with Linen Rack, C - Wide, Ecru
product_meta.description: Size:C - Wide| Color:EcruThis Brabantia Ironing Board is sturdy and reliable and comes with a 10 Year Brabantia Guarantee. It includes a linen rack that allows you to pile folded items for later and it also comes with a heat-resistant ironing cover. Its pointed end is ideal for trousers and thanks to its wide surface you can iron shirts and linen. Always a taut ironing cover – cord binder and stretch system
feature_bullets: Size: C, wide ironing board dimensions: Size - 49 x 18 inches with a 0.98 inch Ivory Frame
Ironing board with standard steam iron rest and convenient linen rack to hold ironing
Handy transport lock keeps the table folded when stored or transported
Extra-wide and ergonomic - adjustable to 4 different heights (30 - 38 inches) and non-slip feet

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,582 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
